Question: OPHIR CO., LTD. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ophir Photonics

2024 Ophir Photonics Catalog

- Laser power and energy sensors, meters, and laser beam profiling systems
- User-friendly design with short, informative descriptions and up-to-date technical specifications
- Organized into two primary sections: Laser Power Meters and Laser Beam Profiling
- BeamWatch and BeamWatch Plus non-contact beam profilers with different specifications
- Easy-to-use laser beam analysis for optimizing additive manufacturing processes
- Ariel stand-alone sensor for measurement of high power lasers
- PDF download or hard copy request options available
- Testament to dedication to innovation and excellence in laser measurement technology
Summary_cn:
Ophir Photonics

2024 Ophir Photonics目录

- 激光功率和能量传感器、仪表和激光束剖析系统
- 用户友好设计，配有简短明了的描述和最新的技术规格
- 分为两个主要部分：激光功率计和激光束剖析
- BeamWatch和BeamWatch Plus非接触式激光束剖析仪，具有不同规格
- 便于使用的激光束分析，用于优化增材制造过程
- 适用于测量高功率激光器的Ariel独立传感器
- 可提供PDF下载或硬拷贝请求选项
- 对激光测量技术创新和卓越的承诺的证明
